patthana3.9:6.1: Noparāmāsaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:7.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.9:9.1: Parāmāsaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.9:10.1: Noparāmāsaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.9:11.1: Parāmāsaṃ akusalañca noparāmāsaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:12.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.9:13.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca … pe … nakamme tīṇi … pe … navippayutte pañca.
patthana3.9:14.1: Noparāmāso akusalo dhammo noparāmāsassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.9:15.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.9:16.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.9:17.1: Noparāmāsaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:18.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.9:22.1: Parāmaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.9:23.1: Aparāmaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aparāmaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:24.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.9:26.1: Parāmaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:27.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.9:29.1: Parāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.9:30.1: Aparāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aparāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.9:31.1: Parāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākatañca aparāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:32.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.9:35.1: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:36.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.9:38.1: Parāmāsasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.9:39.1: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:40.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve) … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.9:41.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā dve (sabbattha dve) … pe … navippayutte dve.
patthana3.9:42.1: Parāmāsasampayutto akusalo dhammo parāmāsasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.9:43.1: Parāmāsavippayutto akusalo dhammo parāmāsavippayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.9:44.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri (majjhime ca ante ca ārammaṇādhipati), anantare dve … pe … sahajāte dve … pe … upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve, kamme dve, āhāre dve … pe … magge dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.9:45.1: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:46.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.9:51.1: Parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāsaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:52.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.9:54.1: Parāmāsañceva parāmaṭṭhañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana3.9:55.1: Parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāsaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.9:56.1: Parāmāsañceva parāmaṭṭhaṃ akusalañca parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāsaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana3.9:57.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.9:59.1: Parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso akusalo dhammo parāmaṭṭhassa ceva no ca parāmāsassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.9:60.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.9:61.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.9:62.1: Parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāsaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:63.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.9:66.1: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto parāmaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.9:67.1: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto aparāmaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:68.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.9:69.1: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto parāmaṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:70.1: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto parāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.9:71.1: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto aparāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.9:72.1: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākatañca parāmāsavippayuttaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto parāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.9:73.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
